entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: A cauldron is mentioned as being empty.

entities.name: ivor dillonsby
entities.description: Ivor Dillonsby is a person who described the cauldron as empty.

entities.name: enid smeek
entities.description: Enid Smeek is a person who used an earthier phrase to describe someone.

entities.name: kendra
entities.description: Kendra's premature death is mentioned as being due to a backfiring charm.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is a person whose life story is revealed for the first time.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is a person who repeated the story of Kendra's death.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: Bathilda is a person who knows the full story of Albus Dumbledore's life.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is a person described as frail and delicate.

relationships.description: Bathilda and Kendra are mentioned together in the context of Kendra's death.
Albus Dumbledore is described as having a family member named Ariana.
Bathilda is mentioned to have used Veritaserum.
Albus Dumbledore's supposed hatred of the Dark Arts is mentioned.
Bathilda knows the full story of Albus Dumbledore's life.
